name: SARIS Rose Floral Water (Rosa damascena)
description: SARIS Rose Floral Water (Rosa damascena) is a natural rose floral water produced by the distillation of rose (Rosa Damascena).Applications:Topical (applied on the skin) - cooling and soothing, improves the elasticity of sun-dried skin, neutralizes itchingRegenerates skin cells and slows down skin agingHas hydrating and antioxidant action on the skinCommonly used as miscelar waterHas a hydrating and anti-inflammatory effectBeneficial for the treatment of inflamed bronchiHelps treat eye infections ( such as conjunctivitis, conjunctival xerosis or dry eye, acute dacryocystitis, degenerative conditions, such as pterygium or pinguecula cataracts) and oral infections due to its antibacterial propertiesNourishes and brings shine to the hairUsed as a flavoring agent in the food industryUsed in aromatherapy since ancient times
